quotes.quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.book: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quotes.quote: I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart: I am, I am, I am.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Brontë

quotes.quote: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky
quotes.book: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.book: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quotes.quote: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: There are years that ask questions and years that answer.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness...
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: We need never be hopeless because we can never be irreparably broken.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.book: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quotes.quote: Beware; for I am fearless, and therefore powerful.
quotes.author: Mary Shelley

quotes.quote: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Whatever you're meant to do, do it now. The conditions are always impossible.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: We shall meet in the place where there is no darkness.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity or registering wrongs.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: The only way out is through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Atticus told me to delete the adjectives and I'd have the facts.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: I know not all that may be coming, but be it what it will, I'll go to it laughing.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The human heart has hidden treasures, in secret kept, in silence sealed.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It's no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.book: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: To thine own self be true.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The past is never dead. It's not even past.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: There are infinite numbers between 0 and 1. There's .1 and .12 and .112 and an infinite collection of others. Of course, there is a bigger infinite set of numbers between 0 and 2, or between 0 and a million. Some infinities are bigger than other infinities.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
quotes.author: André Gide

quotes.quote: It was a pleasure to burn.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Everything was beautiful and nothing hurt.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Life is to be lived, not controlled; and humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There are darknesses in life and there are lights, and you are one of the lights, the light of all lights.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: I think we dream so we don't have to be apart for so long. If we're in each other's dreams, we can be together all the time.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
